trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of connection points for a control in a Web Parts zone acting as a consumer.
This class cannot be inherited.
A control in a Web Parts zone acting as a consumer can connect to only one provider by default.
However, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionConsumerAttribute.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A> property is set to `true`, multiple providers can connect to the consumer.
Note that this class inherits from the <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> class, making this collection a strongly typed, non-generic, read-only collection.
You cannot add or remove members after an instance has been created.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection"></xref> class.
This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection> class with no items in the collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection"></xref> class using the specified collection of connection points.

This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection> class and adds the connection points contained in the `connectionPoints` parameter.
A collection of consumer connection points.
connectionPoints is `null`.
The collection contains an invalid connection point.
\- or -
The collection contains an item with a duplicate ID.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object is in the collection.

Use this method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object is contained in the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection> collection.

This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object before performing a task, such as adding a menu item to or removing a menu item from the collection.
The connection point to search for.
`true` if the consumer connection point is contained in the collection; otherwise, `false`.

Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
Use this method to copy the contents of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection> object into the specified zero-based array.
Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
With the array, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Array> object.

A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection"></xref>.
The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
Gets the default consumer connection point.
This property provides a quick way to find the consumer connection point in a collection that is the default connection point.
The default <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref>.
Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object in the collection.
If the specified consumer connection point item appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> to locate.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of connectionPoint within the current , if found; otherwise, -1.
Gets the item in the collection at the location specified by the integer value.
Use this method to retrieve a connection point from the collection if you know its index value.
The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> item in the collection.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
Gets the connection point with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.ID"></xref> property.
Use this method to retrieve a connection point from the collection if you know its connection point ID.
A string value representing the connection point ID of the connection point to be retrieved.
The first in the collection whose ID matches the value of id.
